page.title: 12Farming (2)
page.content:
{Green Hill Farm}consists of one hundred and fifty acres; twenty five acres is used for horticultural crops, there is an orchard which has apples, pears and damson trees and the remainder is intensively managed grass land. Sown and fertilised grass land is used for pasture or for cutting as grass, silage or hay. The farm machinery includes three tractors,with various attachments, one combine harvester and a bailer.
{Kingsmoor Farm}comprises three hundred acres. The farms main livlihood is derived from pig breeding. The pigs are reared in batteries and farrowing units.
